rationale: This species is currently known from Madagascar, the Philippines, Queensland (Australia), the Rykyu Islands, Vanuatu and Fiji, living in the lower reaches of rivers and streams which discharge to the sea. In view of its wide distribution and the absence of any major threats, the species is considered Least Concern.
assessor: De Grave, S., Page, T., Cai, X. & Wowor, D.
